option explicit
global const _white = &Hffffff global const _yellow = &Hffff00 global const _orange = &Hffcc99 global const _bluegrey = &He6e6ff global const _red = &Hff0000 global const _blue = &h0000ff global const _blue8 = &h99ccff global const _black = &h000000 global const _green = &h009900 global const _purple = &h990099 global const _grey = &H909090 global const _ltgrey = &He6e6e6 global const _blue2 = &h0084D1 global const _green1 = &h355e00 global const _red2 = &hcc3300 global const _blue3 = &h0099cc global const _brown = &h800000
global const _ListGamePlayers = 1 global const _ListGameLocations = 2 global const _ListGameDamaged = 3 global const _ListGameDamagedPeg = 4 global const _ListSkillPlayers = 5 global const _ListSkillCards = 6 global const _ListSkillDecks = 7 global const _ListQuorumHand = 8 global const _ListMutinyPlayers = 9 global const _ListMutinyCards = 10
const _PostCardRow = 4 ' cardID starts at 0, but we want the preamble anyway. const _PostCardCol = 3 ' playerID starts at 1 const _PostQuorumCol = 11 const _PostBenevRow = 29 const _PostAntRow = 30
function GetSelected (listid as integer) as integer dim tmplst() as string
select case listid case _ListGamePlayers GetGS tmplst = GameForm.getByName("lstPlayers").SelectedItems()
case _ListGameLocations GetGS tmplst = GameForm.getByName("lstLocations").SelectedItems()
case _ListGameDamaged GetGS tmplst = GameForm.getByName("lstDamaged").SelectedItems()
case _ListGameDamagedPeg GetGS tmplst = GameForm.getByName("lstDamagedPeg").SelectedItems()
case _ListSkillPlayers GetSF tmplst = SkillForm.getByName("lstPlayers").SelectedItems()
case _ListSkillCards GetSF tmplst = SkillForm.getByName("lstPlyrHand").SelectedItems()
case _ListSkillDecks GetSF tmplst = SkillForm.getByName("lstSkillDecks").SelectedItems()
case _ListQuorumHand GetQrm tmplst = QrmForm.getByName("lstPresidentsHand").SelectedItems()
case _ListMutinyPlayers GetMutinySheet tmplst = MutinyForm.getByName("lstPlayers").SelectedItems()
case _ListMutinyCards GetMutinySheet tmplst = MutinyForm.getByName("lstMutinyCards").SelectedItems()
case else GetSelected = -1 exit function end select
if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then GetSelected = -1 else GetSelected = val(tmplst(0)) end if end function
sub SaveVersion rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem define variables dim document as object dim dispatcher as object rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- rem get access to the document document = ThisComponent.CurrentController.Frame dispatcher = createUnoService("com.sun.star.frame.DispatchHelper")
rem ---------------------------------------------------------------------- dim args1(0) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args1(0).Name = "VersionComment" args1(0).Value = "Turn " & GetCurTurn()
dispatcher.executeDispatch(document, ".uno:Save", "", 0, args1()) end sub
sub GenerateHandLists dim playerID, cardID, cardcnt, fileno as integer dim player, card, filename as string dim PostSheet, LoyaltySheet, CrisisSheet as object ' This is the only function that uses the Posting Template tab, so we can leave it local.
PostSheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Posting Templates") LoyaltySheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Loyalty") CrisisSheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Crisis Cards")
for playerID = 1 to playercnt() player = GetPlayerName(playerID)
' Open file fileno = FreeFile() filename = GetPath(false) & player & ".txt" open filename for output as fileno
' Skill Cards cardID = 0 card = PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostCardCol + playerID, + _PostCardRow + cardID).string do while card <> "" print #fileno, card if cardID = 0 then print #fileno, "" ' A little separation from the title line. end if cardID = cardID + 1 card = PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostCardCol + playerID, + _PostCardRow + cardID).string loop if cardID < 2 then print #fileno, "You have no Skill Cards." end if
' Quorum Hand if playerID = GetTitle(_TitlePresident) then print #fileno, "" cardID = 1 card = PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostQuorumCol, + _PostCardRow + cardID).string do while card <> "" print #fileno, card cardID = cardID + 1 card = PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostQuorumCol, + _PostCardRow + cardID).string loop if cardID < 2 then print #fileno, "You have no Quorum Cards." end if end if
' Mutiny Cards for Daybreak if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then if ubound(GetMutinyHand(playerID)) >= 0 then print #fileno, "" print #fileno, "Your Mutiny Hand is:" for each card in GetMutinyHand(playerID) if card <> "" then print #fileno, card end if next card end if end if
' Loyalty Cards cardID = 0 if IsCylonLeader(playerID) and not GameTypeIsDaybreak() then print #fileno, "" print #fileno, "Your Agenda is: " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(playerID, _LoyaltyAgendaRow).string elseif GetLoyaltyCount(playerID) > 0 then print #fileno, "" if IsCylonLeader(playerID) then print #fileno, "Your Motives are:" else print #fileno, "Your Loyalty is:" end if for cardID = 1 to _MaxLoyaltyInHand card = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(playerID, _LoyaltyRow + cardID).string if card <> "" then print #fileno, card end if next cardID end if
' Super Crisis Card(s) if Cylon. if GetSuperCnt(playerID) > 0 then print #fileno, "" print #fileno, "Your Super Crisis is (are): "
for cardID = 1 to SuperCrisisCnt if CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_SuperNameCol, _SuperRow + cardID).string = player then print #fileno, CrisisSheet.getCellByPosition(_SuperCol, _SuperRow+ cardID).string end if next cardID end if
' OPG / Miracle Tokens if IsCylonLeader(playerID) or not IsRevealed(playerID) then print #fileno, "" if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then print #fileno, "You have " & GetMiracles(playerID) & " Miracle Token(s)." elseif OPGUsed(playerID) then print #fileno, "Your Once Per Game ability has been used." else print #fileno, "Your Once Per Game ability is still available." end if end if
' Trauma in Ionian Nebula if ObjectiveIsIonianNebula() then print #fileno, "" print #fileno, PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostCardCol + playerID, _PostBenevRow).string print #fileno, PostSheet.getCellByPosition(_PostCardCol + playerID, _PostAntRow).string end if ' Close File close #fileno
next playerID end sub
